name: Caitle Royale - V0.1
description:
Note : The recommended way to play is by using the .EXE version
(Better FPS, graphics, etc.) :)

Cool lore :
Basically, a bunch of people decides they are going to fight to the death for no reason because it looks kinda fun.
Also the winner gets a bunch of breadsticks for free so that's that!

Controls :
-Movement : WASD or Controller Left Joystick
-Shooting : Right mouse click or RT 
-Pause : Escape or Start Button

If you enjoyed it or have feedback let me know!
Twitter : https://twitter.com/GabPou 
Discord : Gabriel|Pou#0740

Note : Here is a teaser for the upcoming updates!
-  V0.2 - Map Expansion! (85% done - Releases in february)
-  V0.3 - Adding mercenaries and shop
-  V0.4 - New modes!
